name: Hentai: Magical girls
description:
"Hentai: Magical girls - an exciting puzzle game that allows you to assemble colorful anime-girl pictures in unique poses. Experience the pleasure of solving puzzles and creating stunning images of heroines. You will encounter superb graphics, diverse puzzles of varying difficulty, and numerous pictures featuring girls in different outfits and poses.

Collect all 12 unique pictures, revealing each heroine in all her beauty. The game features 4 heroines, each with their own style and charisma. Use your logic and visual perception skills to overcome various levels of difficulty and enjoy the puzzle-solving process."
